dna_structure_refresh.double_helix: Watson & Crick (1953) — две комплементарные цепи (A-T, G-C)
dna_structure_refresh.genome_size: ~3.2 billion base pairs у человека, ~1.5 GB информации
dna_structure_refresh.non_coding: 98.5% генома = regulatory, structural, 'junk' (на самом деле: эпигенетический control layer)
dna_structure_refresh.packaging: 2 метра ДНК упаковано в ядро 6 микрон через гистоны

cell_diversity_paradox.fact: Все ~37 триллионов клеток тела содержат ИДЕНТИЧНУЮ ДНК (копии одной зиготы)
cell_diversity_paradox.question: Как клетка печени с той же ДНК что нейрон стала печенью?
cell_diversity_paradox.answer: ЭПИГЕНЕТИКА. Разные гены включены/выключены в разных клетках.
cell_diversity_paradox.differentiation: Stem cell → specialized cell через серию эпигенетических модификаций (некоторые необратимые)
cell_diversity_paradox.permanence: Печёночная клетка делится → дочерние клетки = тоже печень (эпигенетическая память сохраняется)

histone_proteins.definition: Катушки, вокруг которых наматывается ДНК. 8 гистонов = 1 нуклеосома.
histone_proteins.types: H2A, H2B, H3, H4 (по 2 каждого = octamer) + H1 (linker)
histone_proteins.function: Не просто структурные — они РЕГУЛИРУЮТ доступ к ДНК
histone_proteins.tails: N-terminal tails торчат из нуклеосомы — здесь происходят модификации

nucleosome_structure.composition: 147 base pairs ДНК обёрнуто вокруг histone octamer (1.65 оборота)
nucleosome_structure.metaphor: Бусины (нуклеосомы) на нитке (ДНК) = 'beads on a string'
nucleosome_structure.compaction: Нуклеосомы сами складываются в 30nm fiber → loops → chromosomes (10,000x compaction)

histone_modifications_code.principle: Гистоновый код — комбинации химических меток на histone tails определяют chromatin state

acetylation.chemistry: Добавление acetyl group (COCH3) к lysine остаткам
acetylation.effect: Neutralizes positive charge → ДНК меньше связывается → chromatin OPENS → gene activation
acetylation.speed: Быстрая модификация (minutes to hours) — responsive to signals

methylation.chemistry: Добавление methyl group (CH3) к lysine или arginine

effects.activating: H3K4me3 (tri-methyl lysine 4 на H3) → gene activation (promoters)
effects.context: Тот же lysine в разных позициях = opposite effects

methylation.stability: Более стабильная чем acetylation (days to permanent)

phosphorylation.chemistry: Добавление phosphate group (PO4) к serine, threonine, tyrosine
phosphorylation.effect: Обычно активирующая — участвует в DNA repair, transcription, chromosome condensation

ubiquitination_sumoylation.effect: Разнообразные — от degradation до transcriptional regulation
ubiquitination_sumoylation.complexity: Mono- vs poly-ubiquitination = разные судьбы белка

combinatorial_code.principle: Комбинации модификаций = язык. H3K4me3 + H3K9ac = actively transcribed gene. H3K9me3 + H3K27me3 = silenced.
combinatorial_code.complexity: Hundreds of possible combinations → огромная информационная ёмкость
combinatorial_code.reading: Reader proteins распознают specific combinations → recruit machinery (transcription, repair, replication)

histone_variants.principle: Кроме канонических гистонов, существуют варианты с особыми функциями

examples.h3_3: Замещает H3 в активно транскрибируемых регионах

histone_variants.function: Fine-tuning chromatin states, marking special regions

mechanism.chemistry: Добавление methyl group (CH3) к cytosine base (обычно в CpG dinucleotides)
mechanism.location: CpG islands (regions with high C-G content, часто в gene promoters)

cpg_islands.definition: Регионы с high frequency C-G dinucleotides (>50% expected)
cpg_islands.unmethylated_default: В нормальных клетках CpG islands обычно UNmethylated → genes active/poised
cpg_islands.methylation_silencing: Когда CpG island метилируется → gene SILENCED (permanently или long-term)

gene_silencing_mechanism.direct: Methylated DNA blocks transcription factor binding (methyl groups стерически мешают)
gene_silencing_mechanism.indirect: Methylated DNA привлекает MBD proteins (Methyl-CpG Binding Domain) → recruit HDACs и HMTs → chromatin compaction
gene_silencing_mechanism.synergy: DNA methylation + histone methylation (H3K9me3) = synergistic silencing (reinforcing loop)

genomic_imprinting.definition: Некоторые гены экспрессируются только от одного родителя (maternal или paternal allele)
genomic_imprinting.mechanism: Differential DNA methylation — один allele метилирован (silenced), другой нет (active)

examples.igf2: Insulin-like growth factor 2 — expressed только от paternal allele
examples.h19: Long non-coding RNA — expressed только от maternal allele

genomic_imprinting.cfo_insight: Материнская и отцовская линии передают РАЗНУЮ эпигенетическую информацию — не просто ДНК, но КАК её читать

x_chromosome_inactivation.problem: Females XX, males XY → gene dosage imbalance
x_chromosome_inactivation.solution: Одна X chromosome в каждой female клетке inactivated (Barr body)
x_chromosome_inactivation.mechanism: XIST long non-coding RNA покрывает X chromosome → DNA methylation + H3K27me3 → silencing
x_chromosome_inactivation.randomness: Random какая X (maternal or paternal) inactivated → mosaic females
x_chromosome_inactivation.example: Calico cats — random X inactivation → patchy color

global_methylation_patterns.function: Silences: transposons (защита от jumping genes), repetitive elements, some tissue-specific genes
global_methylation_patterns.cancer: Global hypomethylation (genome-wide loss) + hypermethylation CpG islands (tumor suppressors silenced) = cancer signature

hydroxymethylation_5hmc.discovery: 5-hydroxymethylcytosine (5hmC) — intermediate в demethylation, но также stable mark
hydroxymethylation_5hmc.enrichment: Высокий в мозге (~1% всех C в neurons vs 0.1% elsewhere)
hydroxymethylation_5hmc.function: Gene bodies of active genes, poised enhancers, potential memory storage
hydroxymethylation_5hmc.stability: Более стабильна чем acetylation, может сохраняться years
hydroxymethylation_5hmc.brain_specific: Neurons accumulate 5hmC through life — potential mechanism для long-term memory storage

vgcc_calcium_channels.definition: Voltage-Gated Calcium Channels — ion channels открывающиеся при деполяризации мембраны, пропускают Ca²⁺ в клетку

l_type.function: Long-lasting current, gene transcription, muscle contraction
l_type.role: ГЛАВНЫЙ для gene expression changes (couples electrical → transcriptional)

activation_mechanism.conformational_change: Voltage sensor (S4 domain) moves → pore opens
activation_mechanism.calcium_influx: Ca²⁺ flows IN (10,000x gradient: outside 2mM, inside 100nM)
activation_mechanism.signal_amplification: Небольшой voltage change → massive Ca²⁺ influx → huge downstream effects

calcium_as_second_messenger.spatial_temporal: Ca²⁺ signals vary в space (microdomains) and time (spikes, waves, oscillations)
calcium_as_second_messenger.specificity: Frequency, amplitude, duration, location кодируют РАЗНУЮ информацию

decoding.creb: cAMP Response Element Binding protein — key transcription factor

pathway_1_camkii.activation: Ca²⁺ influx → CaMKII (Ca²⁺/Calmodulin Kinase II) activated
pathway_1_camkii.result: CREB binds CRE sequences → activates immediate early genes (IEGs)

pathway_2_calcineurin_nfat.dephosphorylation: Calcineurin dephosphorylates NFAT (Nuclear Factor of Activated T-cells)
pathway_2_calcineurin_nfat.transcription: NFAT binds DNA → activates genes (immune, neuronal plasticity)

pathway_3_mapk_cascade.activation: Ca²�+ → Ras → Raf → MEK → ERK (MAPK pathway)
pathway_3_mapk_cascade.nuclear_targets: ERK phosphorylates Elk-1, CREB → immediate early gene activation

immediate_early_genes.definition: Гены активирующиеся быстро (minutes) после stimulation БЕЗ need для protein synthesis
immediate_early_genes.function: Transcription factors (Fos/Jun = AP-1) → activate late response genes
immediate_early_genes.consolidation: IEGs = первый шаг к долговременным изменениям (memory, plasticity)

experience_to_calcium.sensory_input: Light, sound, touch → receptor activation → neuron depolarization → VGCC открываются
experience_to_calcium.motor_action: Movement intention → motor cortex fires → VGCC → Ca²⁺
experience_to_calcium.emotional_arousal: Stress, fear, joy → amygdala/limbic activation → neurotransmitter release → postsynaptic VGCC

experience_to_calcium.social_interaction: Touch, eye contact, conversation → oxytocin, dopamine → modulates VGCC activity

calcium_frequency_amplitude_code.low_frequency: ~0.1 Hz slow oscillations → gene expression changes (learning)
calcium_frequency_amplitude_code.amplitude: Peak concentration determines which Ca²⁺-binding proteins activated
calcium_frequency_amplitude_code.pattern: Spike patterns encode specific information (temporal code)

complete_pathway.step_2_neural_activation: Relevant brain regions fire → action potentials
complete_pathway.step_5_kinase_activation: CaMKII, CaMKIV activated → translocate в nucleus
complete_pathway.step_8_histone_acetylation: CBP/p300 = HAT (Histone Acetyltransferase) → acetylates H3K9, H3K27
complete_pathway.step_10_ieg_transcription: IEGs (c-Fos, Arc, BDNF) transcribed → mRNA → protein

complete_pathway.step_12_structural_change: Late genes → structural proteins, receptors, channels → neuron physically changes
complete_pathway.step_13_dnmt_recruitment: Prolonged activity → DNMTs recruited → DNA methylation
complete_pathway.step_14_stable_mark: DNA methylation + histone methylation (H3K9me3) → permanent silencing или activation
complete_pathway.step_15_epigenetic_memory: Cell divides → epigenetic marks copied → daughter cells inherit 'memory'

timing.late: DNA methylation, stable structural changes (hours to days)

reversibility.acetylation: Highly reversible (HDACs remove) — minutes to hours
reversibility.dna_methylation: Very stable, но erasers exist (TET enzymes) — weeks to months

amplification.single_event: One experience → thousands Ca²⁺ ions → hundreds proteins modified → dozens genes activated
amplification.repeated_events: Each repetition strengthens marks → cumulative epigenetic change
amplification.threshold: Need достаточная intensity/duration для stable modifications
